###Consider the right boundary of PEOPT
###Consider the left boundary of C60
###Consider the right boundary of C60
###Wavelength is from 400  to 700
###11nm PEOPT and 35nm C60 can construct the optimal soalr cell
The intergarl of ICPE is 3621.157
###The thickness of PEOPT	The thickness of C60	The total ICPE
